column4: you need to install unace or unace-nonfree using synaptic or sudo aptitude install unace unace-nonfree
how to change the permission on /azureus/ that the azureus program can access the directory and change files
have a look at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FileCompression#head-033d70db4563be031697f1dc5bfef07586805826, it mentions that you need to unarchive the files using command line
